name: The Alchemist (itch) (exocarrot)
description:
Disclamer : The WebGL version is only available to give a preview, to play the game in good conditions, it is strongly recommended to download a version (Windows or Mac OS).

The Alchemist Description

Long ago, a mysterious alchemist found himself locked in a faraway dungeon.
In that terrible dungeon, many creatures tried to kill him. fortunately the legend has it that he survived.

Now it's your turn to be trapped in this terrible dungeon.
Will you be able to accomplish the same feat as the mysterious man and become part of the legend in your own time?

PS : Luckily before entering the dungeon you found a manuscript, the manuscript of the mysterious alchemist. Here's what it says in it.

Instructions Movements

You can move around the dungeon with [Z][Q][S][D], [LSHIFT] for running and jump with [SPACE].

Interactions

The [E] key will be very useful for interacting with your environment.

Potions

Once in the dungeon, you will face ruthless enemies. Your only means of defence will be the various potions you can find while exploring the place.
Luckily, there are 4 types of primary potions :

  • The fire
  • The earth
  • The lightning
  • The wind

Each primary potion that you can find can be mixed with another and thus create a more powerful potion.
By merging two potions, you get a new potion but lose the old ones.

To help you the mysterious alchemist has left a note in the book with all the potion recipes.

PotionsFireEarthLightningWindFire-LavaExplosionStorchEarthLava-MagnetSandLightningExplosionMagnet-SwiftWindStorchSandSwift- Rooms

The dungeon has many rooms all full of surprises.
Use the minimap to orient yourself.
In the following you will find the following information:

Enemy:

These rooms are dangerous, so don't venture into them unprepared. You will find all kinds of terrible enemies.

Peaceful:

Luckily, the dungeon also has quiet rooms that are safe. Enjoy this rest !

WorkBench:

One of the most important rooms, you'll find a place to fuse your potions.

Heal:

In case of minor health problems do not hesitate to interact with the potion on the table, it will give you the strength to face the future.
But be careful, you can only use the potion once per room, use it only when necessary.

Enemies

Are you ready to discover the enemies that inhabit this place.

Slimes:

Simple, but watch their jump.

Spiders:

They'll track and don't let go until you get rid of them.

Dragons:

They look so sweet, but be careful. Their jet of flame will burn your body.

It is highly probable that since its passage in such ancient times new creatures have appeared. Be on your guard!   

Boss

The bosses are the most terrible creatures in this dungeon, but there's an easy way to deal with it, all you have to do is simply...
Oh no, that page is missing, you'll have to do it on your own.

Good Luck !!
